alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 13 at 3:04AM MST until December 13 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...East winds 20-30 mph with gusts to around 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front, particularly near canyons. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult for high profile vehicles and vehicles with trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds can be expected near the mouths of Farmington and Weber Canyons. Winds of similar speeds are not expected to reach far from canyon mouths.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
